text: Clock Tower 3 is a survival horor video game co-produced by Capcom and Sunsoft for the PlayStation 2. It was released in 2002 in Japan, 2003 in North America and Europe, and 2004 in Australia. It is the fourth installment of Clock Tower series. title: Clock Tower 3
